snippet.textDisplay: I can hear the Plants vs. Zombies final boss theme at 0:55! :O
snippet.textOriginal: I can hear the Plants vs. Zombies final boss theme at 0:55! :O

snippet.textDisplay:
Technically, you can hear this in the PvZ final boss theme. :-P
But yeah, I noticed it too when I first played that game. The composer has said that the Mana series was one of her biggest musical influences, even if she never outright admitted to borrowing a melody from this track.
snippet.textOriginal:
Technically, you can hear this in the PvZ final boss theme. :-P
But yeah, I noticed it too when I first played that game. The composer has said that the Mana series was one of her biggest musical influences, even if she never outright admitted to borrowing a melody from this track.

snippet.textDisplay: The music from Secret of Mana was excellent not just because of the tracks themselves, but how flawlessly they blended in with the area you were exploring or boss you were fighting. This track is no exception.

snippet.textDisplay: i remember watching my brother beat this game and when he got to this part it was so exciting. SoM has such good memories for me.
snippet.textOriginal: i remember watching my brother beat this game and when he got to this part it was so exciting. SoM has such good memories for me.

snippet.textDisplay: The snare bass on this is incredible!  What a rhythm to save the world to.  You can really hear aspects of this similar to other tracks in the game, but this one is still one of the most unique and memorable boss themes ever made.  There was a really neat version of this redone, if you search for Aether - Meridian Dance, it's really quite a beautiful rendition.
snippet.textOriginal: The snare bass on this is incredible!  What a rhythm to save the world to.  You can really hear aspects of this similar to other tracks in the game, but this one is still one of the most unique and memorable boss themes ever made.  There was a really neat version of this redone, if you search for Aether - Meridian Dance, it's really quite a beautiful rendition.

snippet.textDisplay: YES! It took a long time, but this finally got included. This is easily one of the best final boss themes ever. Up there with the final boss themes from Final Fantasy 4 and Mario & Luigi 3.
snippet.textOriginal: YES! It took a long time, but this finally got included. This is easily one of the best final boss themes ever. Up there with the final boss themes from Final Fantasy 4 and Mario & Luigi 3.

snippet.textDisplay:
Not sure if you still do requests, but after hearing it, I'm certain you've played Portal 2, but I gotta suggest Cara Mia, whether you put it up or not.
A beautiful track that translates to have much meaning toward the game, and even the scene is simply awe inspiring.
Not saying you've gotta upload it or anything, just hope you can recognize this and at the very least check it out if you have not.
snippet.textOriginal:
Not sure if you still do requests, but after hearing it, I'm certain you've played Portal 2, but I gotta suggest Cara Mia, whether you put it up or not.
A beautiful track that translates to have much meaning toward the game, and even the scene is simply awe inspiring.
Not saying you've gotta upload it or anything, just hope you can recognize this and at the very least check it out if you have not.

snippet.textDisplay: The only thing that pissed me off here was the way the boss died.  It looked so corny with the mode 7 effects.  That and I was greatly overlevelled which made for a laughable fight, but that was me.  The rest was awesome.
snippet.textOriginal: The only thing that pissed me off here was the way the boss died.  It looked so corny with the mode 7 effects.  That and I was greatly overlevelled which made for a laughable fight, but that was me.  The rest was awesome.

snippet.textDisplay: The final boss in this game was very memorable. The music was awesome, I had a hard time beating it as a kid, I thought the final boss was Flammie and the overall presentation of the fight was unique, with the Mode 7 graphics and all.
snippet.textOriginal: The final boss in this game was very memorable. The music was awesome, I had a hard time beating it as a kid, I thought the final boss was Flammie and the overall presentation of the fight was unique, with the Mode 7 graphics and all.
